Kaguya opens numerous small portals to shoot hazards from her dimensions at the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* While this first appeared in a Kaguya boss battle in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'', it was not named until ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Blazing]]''.
* Yachihoko-no-Kami was a name taken by the god [[Wikipedia:Ōkuninushi|Ōkuninushi]] in the ''Kojiki''.
